首相公選制: (しゅしょうこうせんせい) - system allowing for election of the prime minister by popular vote
首相兼外相: (しゅしょうけんがいしょう) - Prime Minister also serving as Foreign Minister
首相官邸: (しゅしょうかんてい) - prime minister's official residence
首相指名: (しゅしょうしめい) - nomination to become prime minister
首相指名選挙: (しゅしょうしめいせんきょ) - vote by the Diet to appoint the prime minister
首相臨時代行: (しゅしょうりんじだいこう) - acting prime minister
首石: (おやいし) - important stone in a construction
首章: (しゅしょう) - beginning of a book
首筋: (くびすじ) - nape of the neck; back of the neck; scruff of the neck
首筋を違える: (くびすじをちがえる) - to wrench one's neck
首紙: (くびかみ) - neckband; round upright collar (on some traditional Japanese clothing)
首級: (しるし) - decapitated head of an enemy
首肯く: (うなづく) - to nod; to bow one's head in assent; to agree
首脳会合: (しゅのうかいごう) - summit meeting; meeting of leaders
首脳会談: (しゅのうかいだん) - leadership conference; summit meeting; top-level conference
首脳会議: (しゅのうかいぎ) - summit meeting; top-level conference
首脳者: (しゅのうしゃ) - head; leading spirit
首脳部: (しゅのうぶ) - executives; top management; governing body
首腦會合: (しゅのうかいごう) - summit meeting; meeting of leaders
首記: (しゅき) - abovementioned item; description at beginning of (this) text or document
首謀: (しゅぼう) - plotting/planning (crime, intrigue); ringleader/mastermind/leader (of a plot)
首謀者: (しゅぼうしゃ) - ringleader; mastermind; leader (of a plot)
首足: (しゅそく) - head and legs; the body
首輪ペッカリー: (クビワペッカリー) - collared peccary (Tayassu tajacu)
首輪大蝙蝠: (クビワオオコウモリ) - Ryukyu flying fox (Pteropus dasymallus); Ryukyu fruit bat
首途: (しゅと) - (also has an archaic reading of かどいで) leaving one's own house (e.g. when going to war)/departure/setting out; starting a new life/starting life anew
首都圏: (しゅとけん) - the capital city (often Tokyo) area (typically within 50 km of city's centre) (center)
首里王府: (しゅりおうふ) - administration of the Ryukyu Kingdom
首長: (しゅちょう) - head (of organization, organisation); chief
首陀羅: (スードラ) - Shudra; Sudra (member of India's worker caste)
首領: (しゅりょう) - head; chief; boss; leader
首題: (しゅだい) - the opening phrase of a letter or notice
首鼠: (しゅそ) - being unable to make up one's mind; sitting on the fence
首鼠両端: (しゅそりょうたん) - (yoji)  being unable to make up one's mind; sitting on the fence
首鼠両端を持す: (しゅそりょうたんをじす) - (exp,vs-c)  to be unable to make up one's mind; to sit on the fence
馘る: (くびきる) - to behead/to decapitate; to fire/to dismiss
香しい: (かんばしい) - sweet/fragrant/aromatic; (esp. neg. for unsavory, etc.) good (e.g. reputation, rumor)/favorable
香りがする: (かおりがする) - to smell; to smell of; to have a smell
香り米: (かおりまい) - aromatic rice; fragrant rice
香る: (かおる) - to smell sweet; to be fragrant
香を焚く: (こうをたく) - to cense; to burn incense
香具: (こうぐ) - incense set (e.g. burner, tray, tongs, etc.)/incense paraphernalia; incense components (e.g. sandalwood, musk, aloeswood)
香典: (こうでん) - gift brought to a funeral (usu. money); funeral offering; condolence gift; incense money
香典返し: (こうでんがえし) - present given in return for funeral offering
香味: (こうみ) - smell and taste; flavour; flavor
香味料: (こうみりょう) - flavoring; flavouring; spice
香味野菜: (こうみやさい) - potherb; pot herb
香嚢: (こうのう) - perfume pouch; metallic scent ball to be hanged inside
香奠: (こうでん) - gift brought to a funeral (usu. money); funeral offering; condolence gift; incense money
香料: (こうりょう) - flavoring/flavouring/spices; fragrance/perfume/incense; condolence gift
香木: (こうぼく) - fragrant wood; aromatic tree
香櫨園川雲雀貝: (コウロエンカワヒバリガイ) - Xenostrobus securis (species of saltwater mussel)
香欒: (ザボン) - shaddock (por: zamboa); pomelo; Citrus maximus; Citrus grandis; Citrus decumana
香母酢: (カボス) - kabosu (type of citrus fruit) (Citrus sphaerocarpa)
香水瓶: (こうすいびん) - bottle of perfume (scent)
香港テレコム: (ほんこんテレコム) - Hong Kong Telecom
香港ドル: (ホンコンドル) - Hong Kong dollar
香港返還: (ほんこんへんかん) - return of Hong Kong (to mainland China)
香煎: (こうせん) - roasted barley flour; parched flour with various ingredients added and drunk in hot water
香盤: (こうばん) - incense tray/incense burner; programme (theater); seating arrangement (in a theater)
香盤表: (こうばんひょう) - (play or film) cast list
香花: (こうばな) - flowers and incense (given as a Buddhist offering)
